GOD.content: Dome of Rock, House of Lord in Jerusalem, place of dispute btwn monotheistic faiths of transcendent God, absolute other; they fight over it w/ fire & blood (now, more than ever)
GOD.linkedContent: Dome of Rock, House of Lord in Jerusalem, place of dispute btwn monotheistic faiths of transcendent God, absolute other; they fight over it w/ fire & blood (now, more than ever)

FK.content: religion appropriates indemnification of all “proper,” all property: the letter, blood and soil, family, nation
FK.linkedContent: religion appropriates indemnification of all “proper,” all property: the letter, blood and soil, family, nation

FK.content: in our “war of religion,” 2 violences: 1) hypersophistication of military tele-technology 2) “new archaic violence,” counters the first & everything it represents, revenge
FK.linkedContent: in our “war of religion,” 2 violences: 1) hypersophistication of military tele-technology 2) “new archaic violence,” counters the first & everything it represents, revenge

FK.content: in name of Islam, in name of “religion,” desperate (auto-immune) gesture, attacks blood of its own body
FK.linkedContent: in name of Islam, in name of “religion,” desperate (auto-immune) gesture, attacks blood of its own body

S.content: [re: Heidegger’s Rectorship Address] le profond et l’altier ally themselves in most high: highest of what guides the spiritual guides of die hohe Schule and depths of forces of earth and blood

SH.content: circumcision inscribes Nothing in the heart (flesh, living word), to the point of bleeding
SH.linkedContent: circumcision inscribes Nothing in the heart (flesh, living word), to the point of bleeding

TC.content: Artaud: consciousness gives to every act of life it’s blood-red color, its cruel nuance, life is always someone else’s death
TC.linkedContent: Artaud: consciousness gives to every act of life it’s blood-red color, its cruel nuance, life is always someone else’s death

FWT.content: anonymous [death] machines, purifying neutralization of DP, ensure nothing is visible, no blood > what is called for: history/economy of blood, of sacrificial theatricality it channels [Nietzsche]
FWT.linkedContent: anonymous [death] machines, purifying neutralization of DP, ensure nothing is visible, no blood > what is called for: history/economy of blood, of sacrificial theatricality it channels [Nietzsche]

FWT.content: abolitionism [of DP’s paradoxical transcendentalism] must attempt history of blood w/in history of concept of exception, and a history of cruelty [not all cruelty is bloody, i.e. grausam]
FWT.linkedContent: abolitionism [of DP’s paradoxical transcendentalism] must attempt history of blood w/in history of concept of exception, and a history of cruelty [not all cruelty is bloody, i.e. grausam]

DPi.content: cruelty: 1) red blood 2) radical malice [cruelty and exception]
great ambiguity of Christianity: confluence of human blood [re: guillotine] and blood of Christ’s Passion
DPi.linkedContent: great ambiguity of Christianity: confluence of human blood [re: guillotine] and blood of Christ’s Passion

DPi.content: memory/archivization engage suffering body in a machine, technical repetition, Mnemoteknik, must cause suffering, red of fire before red of blood > for N., punishment is not juridical: it’s a movement of life, writing to remember, inscription, imprint past in body
DPi.linkedContent: memory/archivization engage suffering body in a machine, technical repetition, Mnemoteknik, must cause suffering, red of fire before red of blood > for N., punishment is not juridical: it’s a movement of life, writing to remember, inscription, imprint past in body

DPi.content: for Nietzsche, Kant stinks of Christian [?] cruelty, he smells blood, though in German grausam makes no reference to blood (cruor, crudelis, crudelitas reference blood)
DPi.linkedContent: for Nietzsche, Kant stinks of Christian [?] cruelty, he smells blood, though in German grausam makes no reference to blood (cruor, crudelis, crudelitas reference blood)

DPi.content: sans sang (U.S., Eucharist—real presence of blood of God): interiorization of blood in noncruel DP > turning point as a return, ce trop ou ce trope of blood
DPi.linkedContent: sans sang (U.S., Eucharist—real presence of blood of God): interiorization of blood in noncruel DP > turning point as a return, ce trop ou ce trope of blood

DPi.content: guillotine: [doesn’t erase or dry up blood but keeps it] withdraws hands of man
DPi.linkedContent: guillotine: [doesn’t erase or dry up blood but keeps it] withdraws hands of man

DPi.content: red (on flag) as specter of the dead
DPi.linkedContent: red (on flag) as specter of the dead

DPi.content: guillotine: gets rid of bloody hands of executioner (bourreau)
DPi.linkedContent: guillotine: gets rid of bloody hands of executioner (bourreau)

DPi.content: for Hugo, Christ’s law (blood of Christ, good blood) often confused w/ natural law—Christ’s heart will transform written, positive law > it’ll be spiritualized by gentle law of Christ

DPi.content: guillotine’s wooden uprights, buveuse de sang (blood swiller), flowing red > drinks the blood, makes it disappear

DPi.content: [Camus’ bloody description > eyewitness: decapitated, looked like a madman]

DPi.content: blood flows, blood disappears (lethal injection), blood that flows is both spilt blood & blood of genealogy, filiation, father & son
DPi.linkedContent: blood flows, blood disappears (lethal injection), blood that flows is both spilt blood & blood of genealogy, filiation, father & son

DPi.content: still be eating flesh in vegetarianism (will eat waiting for Christ, assimilate his blood as commanded, how can one love w/out being tempted to take it w/in oneself: Love & Eucharist), still be DP after abolition, other figures will be found for it

PSSS.content: btwn performative institution and constative knowledge an absolute hiatus, absolute cut, structure of indirectness, hiatus like a mouth that speaks or wound that bleeds [cruor]
PSSS.linkedContent: btwn performative institution and constative knowledge an absolute hiatus, absolute cut, structure of indirectness, hiatus like a mouth that speaks or wound that bleeds [cruor]

PSSS.content: this discontinuity calls for a leap, what Classical humanist philosophers call freedom, this interruption gives a chance

TN.content: flesh (sarx), Nancy’s Corpus is sarcastic, having it out w/ flesh, flesh of Christ

TN.content: Christianity a religion of blood > beyond point where any religion begins w/ experience of blood

TN.content: as if “touch in itself” were touching blood [Nancy’s self-expulsion] > rapport entre le sang et le sens, entre le ‘coup de sens’ et le ‘coup de sang’ [sens, sang, cent, sans]
